# eas_app (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "eas_app" "eas_app" {
  name = "My App Name"
  slug = "my-app-slug"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) display name
- `slug` (String) app slug

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) app id
